author: jglick
msg: Various microoptimizations to reduce I/O load of common tasks, esp. no-op <javac> and <depend>.
Many inner loops altered to make just 1-2 system calls rather than 4-5.
You can easily see how wasteful the previous code was, and find the culprits,
by patching r/o java.io.File methods and adding to -Xbootclasspath/p (or use AspectJ). E.g.:
Ant still makes an order of magnitude more system calls to do what seem like simple operations
than you would think necessary, but this patch should at least improve the situation.

author: chirino
msg: We now send REDELIVERY acks to the broker when a message is redelivered.  This allows the broker to update the message with the number of times redelivery has occured so that if the message is delivered to another consumer it can DQL the message when max redeliveries have occured across consumers.

author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-1978.  Name-node removes edits.new after a successful startup.
svn merge -c 581745 from trunk into branch 0.14.
